name: Merge Dice: Match 3 Puzzle Simple Fun Colorful
name_original: Merge Dice: Match 3 Puzzle Simple Fun Colorful
description:
The most beautiful number puzzle game for you.
It's easy to play for everyone, however it could also drive genius crazy.
Explore this little game's deep challenge and practice your mind beyond imagination.
Find the same dice and combine them to grow up to get M.

HOW TO PLAY :

Tap the tiles to swap 2 dice to get 3 same dice in a row or a column and get bigger dice. Eg: 1 -> 2, 2 -> 3, ...
If you get M, dice nearby M will disappear, more space, more scores.
Sound easy?
Try to get M and BOOM!

Features:
● Easy to play, hard to master
● Simple and colorful design
● Share high score on facebook, twitter, ...
● Tablets supported
● 4 Play mode, 3 board size
● Funny music, funny sound
JUST ENJOY IT!
